Posted By: JimB Very clean T206 Mathewson / Dark cap graded SGC 86 NM+. It was previously in a GAI 8 holder when I bought it about six or so years ago. Card is super nice with four nm/mt corners and clean reverse. Asking $7500 shipped and insured.
